game.description: Explore the long-abandoned mines and retrieve a valuable mineral sample.
game.objective: Retrieve a sample of the rare ore 'Nefarianite' from the depths of the mines.
reward: A small pouch containing a few crystals imbued with magical properties

tasks.description: Navigate the treacherous tunnels and avoid deadly traps.
tasks.location: The mine's entrance and initial tunnel system
tasks.objective: Reach the first fork in the tunnel without taking any damage.

tasks.description: Solve the riddle of the ancient dwarven puzzle to unlock a hidden chamber.
tasks.location: A small, dimly lit room deep within the mines
tasks.objective: Unlock the secret chamber containing the Nefarianite sample.

tasks.description: Defeat the massive cave troll and its minions in combat.
tasks.location: The depths of the mine, where the tunnel begins to narrow and steepen
tasks.objective: Eliminate all enemies in the area without taking excessive damage.

game.title: The Lost Mines of Nefaria
